message:
Human Slavery/Human Trafficking is happening in our communities and in our backyard. Great work by Cumberland County Sheriff's Office and others for exposing and stopping this horrific crime.  Sheriff Ennis W. Wright: Cumberland County NC   #EndHumanTrafficking
http://bit.ly/2qPLH7K

message_tags.name: Sheriff Ennis W. Wright:  Cumberland County NC

data.description: An "alternative religious group" held children as young as 9 years old as slaves, forcing them to work in fish markets to fund the group's operations, Cumberland County authorities said Wednesday.
data.title: Authorities: Cumberland religious group held children as slaves :: WRAL.com
